welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glenpool, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tulsa International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tulsa International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Okmulgee Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Okmulgee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
